##Load Libraries
```{r}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(pipeR)
library(knitr)

```


##Reference website help from http://asbcllc.com/blog/2014/november/creating_bref_scraper/

```{r}
url <- 'https://www.basketball-reference.com/friv/injuries.fcgi' 
css_page <- '#injuries' 

Injuries <- url %>>%
    read_html %>>%
    html_nodes(css_page) %>>%
    html_table(header = T) %>>%
    data.frame() %>>%
    tbl_df()

```

##Pull Roster Data
```{r}
url <- 'https://www.basketball-reference.com/teams/BOS/2018.html' 
css_page <- '#roster' 

Team <- url %>% 
    read_html %>% 
    html_nodes(css_page) %>% 
    html_table(header = T) %>%
    data.frame() %>%
    tbl_df()

```
